4.24. umbra.globals.runtimeGlobals¶

RuntimeGlobals.py

Platform:
Windows, Linux, Mac Os X.
Description:
This module defines Umbra package runtime globals through the RuntimeGlobals class.

Others:

4.24.1. Classes¶

class umbra.globals.runtimeGlobals.RuntimeGlobals[source]¶

This class provides Umbra package runtime constants.
